{{ if (index .Page.Menus "main") }} {{ $style := .Get "style"}} {{ $nohidden := .Get "nohidden"}} {{ if $style}}
{{ range (index .Page.Menus "main").Children }} {{ if or (not $nohidden ) (and (ne $nohidden nil) (.Identifier)) }} {{(printf "<%s>" $style)|safeHTML}}{{ .Name }}{{(printf "" $style)|safeHTML}} {{ end }} {{end}}
{{else}} {{ range (index .Page.Menus "main").Children }}
  • {{ .Name }}
    • {{ end }} {{end}} {{ end }} {{.Inner|safeHTML}}
